sentences.en: Exposure to CO may enhance the development of underlying arteriosclerosis.
sentences.cn: 一氧化碳暴露可以加剧潜在动脉硬化症的发展.

sentences.en: Food is there to keep you healthy and enhance your enjoyment of life.
sentences.cn: 食物是让人保持健康并增添生活乐趣的.

sentences.en: Good lighting will enhance any room.
sentences.cn: 良好的照明能给房间增色不少。

sentences.en: Good secretarial skills should enhance your chances of getting a job.
sentences.cn: 出色的秘书工作技能会增加你找工作的机会.

sentences.en: Gorbachev's motorcade grew, apparently to enhance his personal safty.
sentences.cn: 戈尔巴乔夫的车队也增大了, 这显然是为了保证他个人安全的缘故.

sentences.en: Her sparing use of make-up only seemed to enhance her classically beautiful features.
sentences.cn: 一点淡妆反而增添了她五官的古典韵味。
它旨在提高教师的专业精神.

sentences.en: Large paintings can enhance the feeling of space in small rooms.
sentences.cn: 大型油画可以增加小房间的宽敞感。

sentences.en: Psychologically, would that not enhance Cowperwood's standing as a financier?
sentences.cn: 在心理上是不是会抬高柯帕乌作为一金融家的身价 呢 ?

sentences.en: Sound engineers utilize a range of techniques to enhance the quality of the recordings.
sentences.cn: 音响师运用一系列技术来提高录音质量。

sentences.en: The forest will enhance the attractiveness of the region.
sentences.cn: 这片森林会为该地区平添更多魅力。

sentences.en: The order urged the armed forces to enhance their alertness.
sentences.cn: 该项命令敦促武装部队提高警惕.

sentences.en: The publicity has enhanced his reputation.
sentences.cn: 这次宣传提高了他的声誉。

sentences.en: They can enhance otherwise mild infections and may reactivate latent viruses.
sentences.cn: 它们能增强轻微传染,还能活化潜伏病毒.

sentences.en: This is an opportunity to enhance the reputation of the company.
sentences.cn: 这是提高公司声誉的机会。

sentences.en: Two nonallelic genes affect the same character and enhance each other's effect.
sentences.cn: 两个非等位基因影响同一性并能增强彼此的效应.

sentences.en: We needed China to enhance the flexibility of our diplomacy.
sentences.cn: 我们需要借助于中国来加强我们在外交上的灵活性.

words.tran_cn: [遗] 增强子；强化剂；增加者

trans.tran_cn: 提高， 增加， 加强
